H0.text: Which device, now a plaything, has a lift end, a dingle end and an elbow. Crane

H1.text: Which device, now a plaything, has a lift end, a dingle end and an elbow. Pipette

H2.text: Which device, now a plaything, has a lift end, a dingle end and an elbow. Dredge

H3.text: Which device, now a plaything, has a lift end, a dingle end and an elbow. Boomorang

A4.text: A crane is a machine used to move materials both vertically and horizontally, utilizing a system of a boom, hoist, wire ropes or chains, and sheaves for lifting and relocating heavy objects within the swing of its boom.

A5.text: The lift hook is operated by the crane operator using electric motors to manipulate wire rope cables through a system of sheaves.
